messages.title: My local issues are
messages.content: Assist first-time buyers and residents in Sutton to help prevent the decay of the town centre. Offer home-owning opportunities in areas where residents desire, without the encroachment of the greenbelt. Support UKIP's policy of reintroducing grammar and technical schools.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Assist first-time buyers and residents in Sutton to prevent the decay of the town centre and offer home-owning opportunities in areas where residents desire.
Support UKIP's policy of reintroducing grammar and technical schools.
UKIP is planning to offer a real referendum on our continued membership of the EU.

issues.education: Support reintroduction of grammar and technical schools

housing.content: Assist first-time buyers and residents in Sutton to prevent the decay of the town centre and offer home-owning opportunities in areas where residents desire, without the encroachment of the greenbelt.

politicalExperience.achievements: Edward has trained as a planning and property partner and leading Midlands law firm. In property, Edward manages and develops industrial real estate which deals with practical problems that help to prevent the decay of industrial estates.
